name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course will teach the use of English in the field of economics and discuss such ideas as world economies, free trade and capitalism through the reading of relevant contemporary literature. All areas of English proficiency (listening, speaking, writing, reading) in the context of economics and business will be considered.
